name: Ninja Stealth 3
description:
Ninja Stealth III is a casual game with 30 challenging levels where your only goal is to get the computer inside the room, can you do it?The Game:
  • 30 new challenging levels
  • New achievements
  • Move inside the room without being detected
  • Hide yourself behind the boxes
  • Camouflage yourself as a box
  • Have fun!
